name: Combo Satisfayer *batteries not included
description: 1 Burger + 1 Side + 1 Drink. The classic American combination par excellence: Smash Burger to choose with VICIO Fries and a drink.

name: Couple Goals *couple not included
description: 2 Burgers + 1 Side + 2 Drinks + 1 Dessert. Share two Smash Burgers to choose from with a couple of drinks, have it with a side and have a happy ending with a dessert.

name: Sex on the beach *beach not included
description: 4 Burgers + 2 Sides + 4 Drinks + 2 Desserts. Have a feast by choosing four Smash Burgers and four drinks. Share two sides and two desserts.
